title: Omit `contentSchema:{}` (it’s the default)
description: `contentSchema` set to `{}` (or `true`) imposes no constraints. Leaving it in the schema only adds noise.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: contentSchema:{} is redundant
comprehensiveExamples.description: An empty contentSchema adds no constraints.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Explicit content schema
comprehensiveExamples.description: Providing a non-empty contentSchema is valid when paired with a media type.

message: Remove empty `contentSchema` – it adds no validation power.
